info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 7:31PM MST until August 18 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM PDT/800 PM MST/ FOR SOUTHERN MOHAVE AND SOUTHEASTERN SAN BERNARDINO COUNTIES... At 731 PM PDT/731 PM MST/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Parker, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. Locations impacted include... Parker Dam, Three Dunes Campground, Cattail Cove State Park, Black Meadow Landing Campground, Earp and Big River. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
